mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIC_TABLECOLUMN ( TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_VALUE, COLUMN_TEXT, COLUMN_ORDER, COLUMN_TYPE, ORDER_TYPE, MODIFY_TIME, COLUMN_UNIT, SWITCHABLE) VALUES ( #{tablename}, #{columnname}, #{columnname}, #{order}, 1, 1, sysdate(), 0, 1)

INSERT INTO south_network.FLOW_DIRECTION_H (R_STATTIME, PROVINCE_ID, CARRIER_ID, PAGEID, MODULEID, PRODUCTID, CLASSID, CATALOGID, RESOURCE_MARK, FLOW_UP, FLOW_DN, CONNECT_COUNT, SUCCESSCONNECT_COUNT, CONNECTTIMEOUT_COUNT, RESPFAIL_COUNT, RESPONSE_DELAY, CLIENT_DELAY, SERVER_DELAY, DATAPACKAGE_UP, DATAPACKAGE_DN, RETRANSPACKAGE_UP, RETRANSPACKAGE_DN, QUALITY_SCORE, PAGE_VIEW, PAGE_TIME, SESSIONTIME, MIDPACKAGEFLOW_DN, MIDPACKAGETIME_DN, BIGPACKAGEFLOW_DN, BIGPACKAGETIME_DN) select ${r_stattime}, ${province_id}, ${carrier_id}, PAGEID, MODULEID, PRODUCTID, CLASSID, CATALOGID, RESOURCE_MARK, FLOW_UP, FLOW_DN, CONNECT_COUNT, SUCCESSCONNECT_COUNT, CONNECTTIMEOUT_COUNT, RESPFAIL_COUNT, RESPONSE_DELAY, CLIENT_DELAY, SERVER_DELAY, DATAPACKAGE_UP, DATAPACKAGE_DN, RETRANSPACKAGE_UP, RETRANSPACKAGE_DN, QUALITY_SCORE, PAGE_VIEW, PAGE_TIME, SESSIONTIME, MIDPACKAGEFLOW_DN, MIDPACKAGETIME_DN, BIGPACKAGEFLOW_DN, BIGPACKAGETIME_DN from FLOW_DIRECTION_H where R_STATTIME=2016102100 and PROVINCE_ID=1
